musanze-gorilla-trek.title: Gusura Gorila i Musanze
musanze-gorilla-trek.description: Inganzo yo gusura gorila mu Pariki y'Igihugu y'Udusozi Twa Volcanos.

musanze.name: Musanze
musanze.description: Inzira ijya mu Pariki y'Igihugu y'Udusozi
musanze.longDescription: Musanze ni ahantu hari gorila z'ibiti kandi hari ahantu nyaburanga hatangaje.
